text: The Melaka House (Malay: Rumah Melaka) is a gallery in Bukit Katil, Melaka, Malaysia to promote wooden handmade products by the local people.http://www.mphtj.gov.my/en/rumah- melaka;jsessionid=324496FB73B3E237F99A723429227FD9 ==Architecture== The Melaka House was built in an area of 5 hectares with a cost of MYR5 million.http://ww1.utusan.com.my/utusan/info.asp?y=2011&dt;=0404&pub;=Utusan_Malaysia&sec;=Selatan&pg;=ws_06.htm ==Opening time== The gallery is open from Monday to Saturday at 9.00 a.m. to 6.00 p.m. ==See also== * List of tourist attractions in Melaka ==References== ==External links== * Category:Art museums and galleries in Malaysia Category:Tourist attractions in Malacca
title: Melaka House
